modName: Troll's Delve - Really Quite Difficult Dungeon
summary: PLAYER COMPATIBLE! FULLY NAVMESHED! MULTIPLE CELLS! LIGHTING AND SOUND!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][b][youtube]xXqSuWWeIGM[/youtube]
[/b][/size][/b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5]LIGHTING AND SOUND![/size][/font][/b][b][size=5][b]
[/b][/size][/b][/center][center][b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5]
MULTIPLE CELLS!

FULLY NAVMESHED![/size][/font]

[/b][size=3]Yes, with [b]Troll's Delve[/b] you can get all these features - and more![/size]
[/center][size=5][b]But what actually is it?
[/b][/size][size=3]A good question. [b]Troll's Delve[/b] is a dungeon mod that's really quite hard. It seems to go out of its way to hinder and annoy you.

[/size][size=5][b][size=5][b]Does it have any requirements?
[/b][/size][/b][/size][size=3]A copy of Skyrim. It would probably help to have access to a computer, too.

[size=5][b]Are there any limitations on what I can and cannot do?
[/b][/size][size=3]It'd be nice if you didn't flat out steal the mod. If you want to alter it in any way (translations, tweaking etc.) feel free but a) tell me beforehand and b) give me at least some credit for it.
[/size]
[/size][size=5][b]This mod sounds great! How do I get it?
[/b][/size][size=3]You download it like any other mod.[/size]
author: connordor
